TH:BikiniMail.NAME: Bikini Mail
TH:BikiniMail.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! block. NL Exhaust.

TH:CursedSword.NAME: Cursed Sword
TH:CursedSword.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust. NL NL That's all, honest!

TH:DeckOfManyThings.NAME: Deck of Many Things
TH:DeckOfManyThings.DESCRIPTION: Add a random rare card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

TH:Mimic.NAME: Treasure Chest
TH:Mimic.DESCRIPTION: Take !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

TH:ElvenBoots.NAME: Elven Boots
TH:ElvenBoots.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
